short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays your public IP address and the corresponding country

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply click on the icon to see the information.
IP info is retrieved from https://ip-api.com/. Flag images are from http://www.iconbeast.com.
